statements: SELECT username, email, profile_picture FROM user_profiles;
SELECT email, username, profile_picture FROM user_profiles;
SELECT profile_picture, username, email FROM user_profiles;
SELECT * FROM user_profiles WHERE username = 'John';
SELECT email FROM user_profiles WHERE username = 'Alice';
SELECT * FROM user_profiles WHERE username = 'Alice';
SELECT username, email FROM user_profiles WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT username, profile_picture FROM user_profiles WHERE username = 'Bob' OR username = 'Alice';
SELECT * FROM user_profiles ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT email FROM user_profiles WHERE profile_picture IS NULL;

SELECT username, email FROM user_profiles;
SELECT id, email, profile_picture FROM user_profiles;

SELECT user_id, first_name, date_of_birth FROM user_details;

SELECT id, username, email, profile_picture FROM user_profiles WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT first_name, last_name, date_of_birth FROM user_details WHERE user_id = 3;

SELECT follower_username FROM user_followers WHERE user_id = 123;

SELECT * FROM user_posts ORDER BY post_id DESC;
SELECT username, profile_picture FROM user_profiles WHERE email LIKE '%example.com';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS num_followers FROM user_followers WHERE user_id = 123 GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT user_id, follower_username FROM user_followers WHERE user_id = 456 ORDER BY follower_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT id, username, email FROM users;
SELECT u.username, ud.first_name, ud.last_name FROM users u JOIN user_details ud ON u.id = ud.user_id;
SELECT u.username, up.theme FROM users u JOIN user_preferences up ON u.id = up.user_id;
SELECT username, notifications_enabled FROM users u JOIN user_settings us ON u.id = us.user_id;
SELECT id, username, email FROM users WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM user_details WHERE first_name = 'John' AND last_name = 'Doe';
SELECT username, theme, language FROM users JOIN user_preferences ON users.id = user_preferences.user_id;
SELECT username, notifications_enabled FROM users JOIN user_settings ON users.id = user_settings.user_id WHERE notifications_enabled = TRUE;
SELECT u.username, p.theme, s.notifications_enabled FROM users u JOIN user_preferences p ON u.id = p.user_id JOIN user_settings s ON u.id = s.user_id WHERE u.id = 2;

SELECT username, profile_picture FROM user_profiles WHERE username LIKE 'A%';
SELECT user_id, post_content, created_at FROM user_posts ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT post_id, user_id, COUNT(*) AS total_likes FROM user_likes GROUP BY post_id HAVING total_likes > 10;
